short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes annoying full-page ads from HS.fi, if you're logged in to the site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes annoying full-page ads from HS.fi, if you're logged in to the site.

Full-page ads require user intervention, ie. user must click "close ad" to see page content. Even if they pay for the service already. This plugin injects JS to the page, and hides ad, if it is present.

(Ie. removes class frontpage-ad-visible from body tag, if also user-logged-in class exists.)

Updates

 - 1.1.0: also removes ads asking user to order the newspaper, loads also when using HTTPS
 - 1.1.1: log to console when removing elements
 - 1.1.4: ???
 - 1.2.0: added Google Analytics tracking (count how many timse ads have been hidden, collects anonymous data)
 - 1.2.1: Fix GA protocol handling.
